lv.ailab.lnb.fraktur.ngram
Class VariantEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  lv.ailab.lnb.fraktur.ngram.VariantEvaluator

public class VariantEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

Tool for providing comparable rating for how "probable" each transliteration variant (or arbitrary text string) is.

Field Detail

maxNGramLevel

public int maxNGramLevel
Constructor Detail

VariantEvaluator

public VariantEvaluator(java.lang.String beginTag,
                        java.lang.String endTag,
                        java.lang.String unknownTag,
                        java.lang.String vocabFile,
                        java.lang.String nGramFile,
                        int level)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Constructor.

Parameters:
beginTag - Tag denoting begining of the word in the N-gram file. is used, if null or empty string provided.
endTag - Tag denoting end of the word in the N-gram file. <\s> is used, if null or empty string provided.
unknownTag - Tag denoting out-of-dictionary character in the N-gram file. is used, if null or empty string provided.
vocabFile - Path to vocabulary file - one character per line. If length of line is more than 1, and line is not equal to special values pased in variables (beginTag, endTag unknownTag), error will rise. Space characters are not supported.
nGramFile - Path to N-gram statistics file. Statistics must be log.
level - length of the longest N-grams provided.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
Method Detail

evaluateToken

public double evaluateToken(java.lang.String token)
Calculate evaluation for this token.
